message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn to propose!
You started high, now it's my turn to make a counteroffer. I'll give you less, but it's still a good deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think you can do better than this. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm not going to meet you in the middle, but I'll give you a bit more. It's still a good deal for me.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. This is my final offer!
You've been trying to lowball me, now it's my turn to make a strong offer. This is my best deal, take it or leave it.
